115.content:
You freak out! This had never happened before! It was hard facing the truth you were a ghost and didn't know how to go about changing anything, were you dead forever? What were your next steps? You remember your sister was having a friend over. She was Caitlin's right hand woman she was more attractive than your sister having C cups and a round firm ass but she was a lot ditzier you wonder about possessing her and seeing your sister that way, at least then you wouldn't be presenting yourself as another member of your family especially her sister. You didn't know how to make a move, you'd never done this sort of thing before, you looked intently at the blissfully ignorant girl and you went for her.

Because you're lack of aim you landed in her leggings her fine ass pasted into what was currently your face area. You could vaguely hear the door bell ring and your mom answering it. You could feel yourself making your way through your house and into your sisters room.

Alex wasn't like your sister in an opposite attracts kind of situation, she was brunette where your sister was blonde, fashion orientated where your sister was sporty and boy focussed where your sister was... well not. She was nice, polite to your parents, but only payed slight notice to you. Flirty looks we're passed but you don't go for 13 year old though looking at her as a ghost made you feel less guilty for your perverted thoughts.

You knew you were in your sisters room as you could hear her giggle as you walked in and felt her clothes against you when you were locked in an embrace. You needed to tell her what was going on but you didn't know how to control your new found abilities yet. To ease any sound effects you thought you'd use a 'bobbing' method try and possess and depossess Alex in bursts as opossed to taking her over completely.

You let her and your sister converse then you do an opportunity whilst your sister had got up to get some clothing and pounced, well, it was less of a pounce and more of a seep in. You seeped in to her body, you momentarily blacked out and then... you were in.

You looked through your new eyes adjusting to the light then peered down to look at your new cleavage you daren't move as you didn't want to hurt the poor girl you were in ha biting but you needed to speak up for this 'plan' of yours to work.
'Caitlin! It's your brother. I'm a ghost. I don't have long. I don't know how this possession thing works but I don't want to hurt your friend so I plan on bobbing in and out of her body to reduce collateral, I'll be back.'

You then seeped back out of her body but instead this time to her crop so ibtead of feeling her nice ass you were feeling her round boobs- well her bra. Given it was as comfortable as being in a tight crop top can be.

Alex resumed talking as if nothing had happened. There must have been a sewerage switch which dictatated whether the 'victim' remembered or not. Your sister seemed taken aback and to the oblivious Alex she seemed strange.
'Are you okay, Caits' Alex asked concerned at the sudden shift in atmosphere.
'Y...yeah come back Dash'
This was a gamble at this point if, you couldn't come back this would have made a awkward conversation and on a better day when you hadn't just found out you were a ghost you could have fucked with her, but today if all days you decided to take her back over.

You seeped through her again accessing her control points. You decided it probably wouldn't hurt staying a tad longer this time, you started.
'This must be so weird to you, I mean, it's not everyday your best friend is possessed by your brother. You stifle an awkward laugh and carry on
'I found I was able to possess people I knew it. Like a switch in the back of my head had just switched on. Then I... looked at myself I was translucent and didn't know what to do I freaked out...'
'So you possessed Alex?' You sister managed to question through her stunned silence.
'No' you answered simply 'I needed to talk to someone share this secret, I wanted to talk to you I trusted you, out of everyone. So I decided a plan. If I possessed one of our family you could have 1- thought they were fucking with you or 2- be weirded out that your brother was possessing one of his family. I remembered that Alex was coming over today so I thought I could relay this through her.'
'God damn it, I believe you, so you live in clothes and can possess people from that?' She asked
You nodded.
'Okay gimme my friend back so I can ask her to leave then I need to talk to you.'
'Wait so do I possess her clothes'
'Ni, take this' she tossed her new bra and panties set. And indictcated with her head for you to jump into it. You left Amex's fine body and in some dust cloud possessed her set. You knew you hadn't missed out on Alex as she was staying over in a couple of days and could have some fun when you'd perfected your powers.

After this your sister asked Alex to leave giving an illness as an excuse and leading her out the door you wait for her to come back.

1152.content:
She came back inquisitive,
'so you can possess clothing and then the person?'
'Yes, I'm not terribly sure how it works. All I know is I can wait in multiple pieces of clothing. But I noticed something I'm currently in a bra and panties set and I feel weaker than I did in one piece of full clothing, like a t-shirt so i think that spreading my self across say, a full outfit I'm weaker in the out fit. 14.content: A few minutes later after an ambulance takes your broken body away and the police leave with Burt, you Sit on the sidewalk contemplating what you do now. While you are doing that a little girl walks up to you. (She is a 6 year old redhead caucasian wearing a white t-shirt with a picture of a stereotypical cartoon ghost on it, a brown leather jacket, a pink frilly skirt and black knee high boots with a slight heel she is also carrying a pink backpack). "Hello Mr. Ghost!" you hear from behind you. You turn around to see the little girl behind you. "You can see me?" you ask recalling all the other passersby walk by and did not look to see you. "Of course silly you are right in front of me." she says. "My name is Lily what is your's?" You try to say your name but you realize you can't remember your own name and lots of your old memories. You figure it is somehow because you are dead. "I don't remember what my name is." you tell Lily. "That's all right I'll just call you Mr. Ghost." She says cheerfully. "Do you know where you live Mr. Ghost?" "No." Lily's smile begins to widen. " You can come live with me!" She says very excitedly. "Are you sure about that?" you ask a bit surprised. "Sure, I LOVE ghosts but, you're the first one I met." She says timidly. "I would love to have a lot of fun with you." "Okay, I will go 'live' with you at your place." you say sure that Lily would not stop pestering you to do so. "THANK YOU!" she says very happy you will go live with her. You approach her house sometime later. It was a HUGE mansion you figure Lily is very rich. "Well this is my home." she says. You two walk in she puts her backpack near the door. "I'm Home!" she yells. "Welcome home!" you can hear from another part of the house. It sounded like a older woman so you figure it was Lily's mom. "I'm cooking dinner it will be ready in a couple of hours!" Lily's Mom says. "Come on to my room." Lily whispers. You follow her up the stairs to her room. She then proceeds to take off her boots and jacket and throw them on the ground. "So what's it like to be a ghost? " she says while staring at you from her bed. " It's all right I guess but I miss having a body." you say. "Well if you want a body you can have mine." Lily says nonchalantly. " Wait really!" you say shocked she give up her body so casually. "Yeah I always wanted to know what it is like to be possessed after all I LOVE ghosts." she says horrifyingly excited about this. You realize just how much this little girl loves ghosts. "Are you sure you want to be possessed?" you say still unsure she can be ok with that. "Yes Mr. Ghost I am sure." "Ok." You say as you approach her and try to possess her. A few failed attempts later, "Why haven't you possessed me yet Mr. Ghost? I said it was ok ." She says a bit upset. "I tried to Lily I guess I can't." You say as you accidentally step on her boots. All of a sudden you feel like something pulling you into her boots as you get fully sucked in your perspective changes you can only see darkness and a bit of the ceiling. You realise you can only see from the soles in the boots. You decide you dont want to be a pair of boots forever so you try depossess the boots. After a couple of attempts you manage to almost leave them when you get sucked back in even harder then before. You figure you are stuck in the boots forever. "So you can only possess clothing." you hear Lily say out of your limited line of sight. "I hope you don't mind if I put you on Mr Ghost." She says as you can feel footsteps approaching. You want to abject but as you have no mouth all you can do is watch as Lily sticks her legs in you. When she puts both boots all the way on you black out. When you wake up you feel different. When you look down you realize you possessed Lily. You look on your new legs and see that you still have the boots on. You quickly deduce that in order to possess someone they have to wear you. You then proceed to take the boots off. When both boots are of your soul gets ejected back into them. Mere moments later Lily wakes back up. "So that's what it's like to be possessed." She thinks aloud. "It's the best!" she says with no shock coming from you knowing how much she loves ghosts. "I want you to do it all the time." She says. "Time for dinner!" her mom says. "Coming!" She says. "I'll put you back on later Mr. Ghost, bye." She says as she leaves. With this moment to yourself you decide what to do. You can now see a part of her massive closet you see lots of clothes in there including a a lot of diffrent pairs of boots you don't even see any different kinds of shoes. You figure she must love boots as much as ghosts. Through the vision of the sole of the other boot you're possessing that is lying on Lily's bed you can see outside a window. All you can see is a couple of girls walking down the street. One appears to be a goth girl the other appears to be going to or from the gym hence the gym attire. With this moment away from Lily you decide what to do
14.title: The Sixth Sense

1422.content: You see a pair of white panties with a bunch of cartoon ghosts on it. You don't like being a pair of footwear so you decide to try to become them instead. So you concentrate on your being and try to push yourself into the underwear. After a bit of focus you manage to push yourself into the underwear and you black out. When you wake up you see that some cloth is in your way of sight. You soon figure out that you see from the tag in the underwear. After a bit of waiting you hear footsteps approach. "I'm back Mr. Ghost!" you hear Lily say. Out of the corner of your 'eye' you can see Lily stare at the boots you were in. "There is no blue fog around my boots anymore." Lily says a bit confused. You figure that's how Lily was able to tell you were in her boots. "Where are you Mr. Ghost?" Lily says. She the proceeds to look around the room until she stares at you. "There you are Mr. Ghost, you are my underwear." Lily says as she approaches you. "That's ok I can take these ones off." She says as she takes of an identical pair of underwear. "Time to come on in me Mr. Ghost." Lily says as you you are weirded out that a six year old girl would say that. She then proceeds to put you on as you are disgusted to have a little girl's butt in your 'face'. When she put you all the on you blacked out and wake up as Lily again. " Looks like I'm forced to be you forever Lily." you say with Lily's voice knowing she will not let you 'live' otherwise. You look out the window to discover that it is night time. You decide to put on some pajamas so you look through her big closet to find a pair of pink pajamas with ghosts stitched on. You figure that was probably her Mom or some of the servants you haven't who you haven't seen around yet who stitched the ghosts on. You wonder how you knew she had servants then you realize you can look into Lily's memories when you are possessing her. You proceed to put the pajamas on only to find out that they are very warm and cozy. You figure they must be expensive to be this cozy. You figure it has been a long day so you get in your new warm bed go to sleep. When you wake up you nearly freak out to discover you were a girl. "Oh yeah." you say blushing feeling ashamed about how you could forget what happened yesterday. Looking through Lily's memories you discover that it is the first day of summer vacation for her. Happy to not have to go to 3rd Grade you decide to get dressed to go explore your new home. You take off your cozy pajamas and look through the closet for what to wear next. After a bit of looking you put on a black skirt some pink and white socks and a light green shirt with a crude drawing of a cartoon ghost on it. Looking through Lily's memories you discover she drew it on with permanent ink so it would stay on the shirt.You also put on a pair of brown boots with flat heels. Happy with your outfit you decide to leave your room and explore your new home. WHERE DO YOU EXPLORE FIRST?

choices: Lily gives you her blessing to live how you want.
Lily wants to stay the "ghost girl" forever.
Wait, Lily, where are you going! You're really leaving me as a glove?!
1422322111.content:
It occasionally struck you that Lily had essentially gifted you a second life. Her body had matured into a beautiful woman, someone you would have enjoyed dating when you were your old self. Your old self... over a decade ago, you knew what that meant to be. You knew Lily's family intimately, moreso than Lily even did, and now it would be impossible to leave her body not just because of the fact that Lily would just put you back on, but because she couldn't easily function without you--not to mention her obsession with you being in control.

Your life--Lily's life, really--was at a critical turning point. As much as she loved your control, which you still couldn't explain, you felt a bit guilty that you were essentially getting a fresh start. You had nearly graduated high school when you had died, and that had given you knowledge that put you in all sorts of advanced classes--you were viewed as some sort of child prodigy, and now you had some amazing opportunities if you go to college, to do incredible things.

But as you walked to your grave and sat down in front of it--something that had become a normal event for a girl with some strange paranormal fixation so no one bothered you--today you decided would be the day you get answers. And as comfortable as you have become piloting Lily... today you needed closure. You needed to know if you could continue the life that you lost, or if you had to keep up the act. Staring at your headstone, at your death date twelve years ago, made the situation sink deep into your mind.

You were wearing a fingerless glove on your left hand, and you transferred your ghostly presence along the clothes to it. You took out a notebook, writing on one of the blank pages in simple words, at least as simple as you could think for a six year old to understand.

Lily,

It's Mister Ghost. I have lived in your body for a long time. I will stay with you like this. But if I stay, I want you to do something for me. Please write and draw in this notebook. Why do you like me? Can I take us to college and change our lives? Will you let me be Lily in my own way?

You left the notebook by your side on the grass. Even if Lily had this infatuation with the paranormal, you knew if you were going to keep going on living her life, you had to 'grow up' essentially. But you needed Lily to agree before you did anything... if she said no, if she wanted you to keep the ghost fixation, you would do it and keep Lily on her current course, even if it was a falsehood. It was a question of if you would continue to play a part or take control of your destiny yet again. But you had to know from Lily for sure, even though you hadn't asked so much of her before.

You took off the glove, slid it off in a swift motion--and your consciousness fell to the ground when you did, looking up at Lily and waiting to see what she would write.
1422322111.title: Your Grave

choices: Burt the bully that killed you
14223221112.content:
After falling to the ground you watch as Lily looks at her surroundings, then at you and finally back at the notebook. You then watched Lily as she moved the notebook around, trying to read it, she was even sounding out some of the words which you had to admit looked pretty cute. She then grabbed the pen and started writing after which she set them down, proclaimed “All Done!” in a toddler like mannerism, then grabbed you and put you back on, putting you back in control. You then picked up the notebook and began to read it which was not easy because it was very crudely written with weird wavy lettering and writing all over the place. Either way you began to read what you thought was the first sentence.
“Please doo not get rid of ghostes.”
You figured as much. No matter how much time has passed for you, Lily never was ‘awake’ during your time in her, she is still an adaman 6 year little girl who loves ghosts. With that you decide to respect her wish and keep the ‘ghost obsession’ which to be honest you kind of liked anyway, but you figure you can at least still tone it down a notch. You then read the second sentence.
“You cAn go to College if yOu want yOu can go aneewere.”
That was a load off you. It seems like you can move on to college now with Lily’s approval, well either that or Lily thought ‘College’ was just someplace you wanted to go, either way you got her permission. Finally you read the final sentence.
“I like yOu beecuz yOu R a ghost it feels really good wen you R in me. I go to sleep and feel good.”
You’ve heard that before occasionally from Lily when not possessing her but you never really knew what she meant by that. Then it dawns on you. When you possess her and her consciousness falls asleep, she might be feeling intense sexual and orgasmic pleasure as she sleeps. That might explain why she has let you possess her all these years, or she just feels feelings of happiness when you’re in her. ethier way you’re finally starting to understand why she’s kept you around for so long. After packing up you’re stuff you then begin to leave your grave. After walking a good distance you turn around to see someone approach your grave. WHO IS IT?
14223221112.title: Lily wants to stay the "ghost girl" forever

(She is a 35 year old redhead with a tight short red dress on) As she picks you up you can see her panties. Not wanting to be stuck as a child's footwear you try to possess her panties. After a couple moments you succeed and black out. When you wake up you realize you are now possessing Lily's Mom. You then see Lily come in. "Oh, hi Mr. Ghost I guess you're my mom now huh?" says Lily a bit sad. "Well don't be her too long I want you back in me." she says as you feel a bit disturbed the way she said that. You then proceed to Lily's Mom's room and look through her closet. As you look in her closet you see a lot of tight looking dresses, jeans, jackets and just like Lily the only type of footwear she has is different types of boots. You figure Lily got her love for boots from her. You find a cute pair of thigh high black boots with a slight heel which you hop into. As you do so you hear Lily's Mom's body drop onto the ground. "What was that!?" Lily's Mom said ecstatically. "I was being possessed but felt like the best orgasm in the world while it happened." You figure while you are possessing someone their soul is constantly in the best state of orgasm they will ever experience.You figure that's why Lily want's you to possess her forever. She then looks at you. "Whatever you are you are the one that did that right?" she says. "I want you to do it again!" she says "It felt so good I want you to do it forever ok?" she says as puts he leg into you. You black out again and wake up as her wearing the boots. Now instead of one girl pining for you now you have two. What do you do now?
143.title: Someone walks in

15.content:
You were dead. You could feel yourself. You were not quite whole. This was strange. You saw a note, on the floor, and you went to pick it up. It said 'this was part of the plan don't worry... you are dead... but the power you have been given is far better than life anyway.'

Who was this mystery note from and why did you get this power out of everyone. You wondered what it could be. You presumed it was the obvious pick. Possession. You were curious about it. But did not want to try it out there and then. You needed some kind of security for it to go wrong. You sat and thought really hard.

I could go home, or to a friends house.

At home you had your 13,16 sisters and your mother.

And at your friends house you had your 17 year old friend Lucy.

Or your girlfriend Eliza

Or finally your friend Jake.
15.title: Other

info.brief_description: Possess people's clothes, and then possess THEM!
info.description:
This is a story about you! You are Dash Miller, a 17-year old guy who's in college. After you get strangled, you return as a ghost. When you try to fly into someone, it fails. Instead you end up possessing their clothing! You can possess people's clothing, and lie in wait for the perfect opportunity to strike and possess the wearer. You can also tear clothing off someone and attach it to someone else, then possess the newly dressed person. You can also slightly influence the person that wears you, so as to make them gradually evil, or the opposite. Or you can make them buy clothes you like, if you want that.

Family: Dave Miller: Your dad. An Airforce pilot currently in Qatar for training. Caring, yet tough man. Thinks that you should be joining the military too.

Karen Miller: Your mom. A stay at home-mom, who loves her family more than anything in the world.

Caitlin: Your sister. 13 years old, still developing although she already has B's, soccer player, likes you very much, a tomboyish girl.

Taylor: Your sister: 16 years old, very hot, D's, cheerleader captain, doesn't like you.

Mutt: Your dog. Really playful.
